results.name: CONFÍA (p r o c e s o s)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • Storage: 325 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: It will probably run on any PC
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

results.name: Deep in to the caves demo
